title: Blue Bottle Coffee French Press
preparation_steps: Grind 30 grams of coffee to medium-coarse consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 30g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 480g hot water in slow spiral
Stir gently 4 times to ensure even saturation
Place lid on top, do not press plunger
Press plunger down slowly, pour within 15 seconds

notes: Blue Bottle's French Press method focuses on precision and consistency. The slow spiral pour and gentle stirring ensure even extraction, while the medium-coarse grind provides the perfect balance of body and clarity.
